Starscream

Starscream hid himself as the bots landed. He looked at them. From 
his studies he knew that the red one was Inferno, but the 
others....they were like him, but blue. He whispered a message in a 
secret frequency.

"Phobia? KitKat? Anyone? It's Starscream. I'm at the ruins. Inferno 
is here, probably planning an ambush. But he's brought 5 other 
people, who look exactly like him except they are blue. Almost 
like.....clones. My God! If Megatron has mastered cloning technology, 
he will have a never ending army! Please hurry. The Lavacons and I 
will engage."

He quietly walked over to the Lavacons.

"Soldiers! Your time has come! Those 6 bots over there are servants 
of the Enemey. We must engage them!" Starscream waited for the 
Lavacons to arouse.
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron helped Wheeljack get it on the platform.

"Come, on. Let's go. Zardus needs to see this."
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois came out of stasis lock for a second, noticing that he was 
moving. He was still very groggy though.

"Where am I...." But before he could get a clear picture, he went 
back to stasis, his head wires still frazzeled.

______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq heard what Ramulus said.

"What? You mean we might not even fight? This sucks." They laughed as 
they continued walking in cloak. They walked a bit with Ramulus and 
than turned off track to join Snowcat so that the Trainers couldn't 
smell anything.
______________________________________________________________________
Trainers

Prebon laughed.

"Excellent Slayer. First clear shot you get, take him out. If you do 
this succesfully, you will get a large reward." He turned to Spears, 
pulling out his blaster.

"I'm going to have this to your head during the process. The safety 
is on, so it won't fire. Just keep your coll and scream your head 
off." Prebon laughed at how dumb that sounded. He opened a comm to 
Hammer.

"Are you all in place?"

"Yes sir. If we here gun fire than we'll be there."

"Excellent. Their's me, and you Spears, and Slayer, and the other 
four Trainers, and Savage. That's 8. Their is no way they could've 
gotten a force larger than 8 in the short time they had." He grabbed 
Spears' arm and put the gun to her head, waiting for the time.

"Everything will be all right," He whispered to her, kissing her 
cheek.
